scenario_text.value:
The time for a kid to grow into an adult.
Waiting that long’d mess anyone up.
Who knows... I might end up like Renamon.

I doubt they’ll be able to reconcile anytime
soon. Renamon, or the Professor’s partner.

Still, I don’t want to give up on them yet.
If the professor can’t handle it alone...

We just have to lend him a hand. With our
help, I bet he can do it.

Yeah. It won’t be easy, but we can handle it
if we combine our strength...
That’s what I’ve learned in this world.

Still, Renamon watched over Miyuki for so
long. I can’t even imagine all that time.

The years we’ve been alive feel long enough
in their own right...

It must have been hard... Still, Renamon
protected Miyuki the whole time.

Miyuki must have been more precious than
anything else.

Now I think we’ve gotta rescue Miyuki for
Renamon’s sake, too.

Saving Miyuki is the first step to fixing
everything that’s going on.
(So then, what should I say here?)
We should fight together.
We need your power.
We should fight together.
We should fight together.

Of course! I mean, I know my strength doesn’t
amount to much...
But I’ll do everything I can!

I’ll do the same. If we all give it
everything we’ve got...

We can do anything! Right? Wow, I’m loving
the energy here!
We need your power.
We need your power.

No need to ask! But I mean, we’re all in this
together, so...
It’s a little weird to ask me directly.
...True. We’ll handle this together.

Since coming to this world, I realized...
I can’t do anything on my own.

I definitely wouldn’t have made it this far,
that’s for sure.

I feel the same. I’m sure everyone is in the
same boat.

Ryo and Shuuji sure have changed a lot since
they got here.
Is this what they mean by growing up?
You’ve grown too, you know.
You think? I’d be happy if that was true.
Our adventure’s almost over...

With the way everyone is now, I think the
best outcome is waiting for us.

I was thinking the same thing! It’s like
you’re reading my mind or something!
I don’t think that’s quite it.

This is one of those times you’re supposed to
nod and say yes, okay?
Right, right, sorry.
Well, as long as you get it.
...Hey, Takuma?

Do you think we’ll be able to stay with our
partners once this is all over?

(That’s a hard question... Still, I don’t
want to crush her hopes here.)
(Hmm, I’ll say that we’ll...)
Be together forever.
Part one day, maybe.
Be together forever.

We’ll be together forever. Our bonds can’t be
broken that easily.

Yeah! I get the feeling we’ll always have
them around!

For better or for worse... Ahaha, kinda like
at a wedding, right?

This relationship is almost just as sacred,
I’d say.
Yeah!
We’ll always be together... Forever!
You said it! Together forever!
Part one day, maybe.

We may part one day. It’s possible we won’t
be together forever.

Sure, the day we say goodbye might come.
But I think...

I think we’ll always be together. And that’s
not wishful thinking... I really believe it!
...That sounds nice. I’ll try believing, too!

I bet everyone feels the same way! That’s why
it’ll be okay!

...Well, there’s a chance I won’t be around
all that long, though.

How’re you doing...? Physically, I mean?
You shouldn’t push yourself too hard...

I didn’t come this far just to sit back and
watch! Besides, it’s not that serious!
Having Floramon around is a natural remedy!
It must be the power of our bond!

That’s why, as long as we’re together...
I’ll survive. I just know it.
Yeah. I’m sure you’ll make it through.

We’ve dealt with all kinds of things up to
now, and overcome all of it!

That’s why I’ll overcome this, too... This
body won’t stop me!

You’d better remember me like this, okay?
You won’t forget me if I’m gone, will you?

(This is heavy. I wish she wouldn’t talk like
that. Maybe I can consider her feelings?)
(How should I respond?)
Don’t say that.
I’ll remember you.
Don’t say that.

Don’t say things like that, Saki. You’ll
always be here...
With Floramon. With all of us.

Jeez, lighten up, already! It was a joke!
They have those where you come from, right?
There’s no way I’ll die!

This amazing life surrounded by amazing
friends—I ain’t letting it end anytime soon!

I’m going to live this life to the best of my
ability! I’m gonna survive!

I hear that... You deserve it, and I’ll help
get you there.
Thanks! All right, let’s do this!
I’ll remember you.
I’ll remember you.

Whoa, come on! I was just joking! I won’t die
even if someone kills me, you hear?!
Oh, a joke, huh...
Of course! Don’t go killing me off so easily!
I’m gonna live, with everyone!
Still, I guess it was in poor taste.

As an apology, I’ll get my butt in gear for
whatever you need! Send any task my way!

Ahaha, if you’re gonna go that far, then I’ll
take you up on that.
Yeah, leave it to me!

(Hope’s what keeps Saki going. Yeah...we have
hope, don’t we?)
